name: Spider-Man
description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker now has spider-like abilities.

name: Iron Man
description: Genius billionaire Tony Stark dons a high-tech suit of armor to become Iron Man.

name: Thor
description: The Asgardian God of Thunder wields his mighty hammer Mjolnir.

name: Hulk
description: Dr. Bruce Banner transforms into the powerful Hulk when angry.

name: Captain America
description: Steve Rogers, enhanced to the peak of human perfection, wields the shield.

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff is a highly trained spy and combat expert.

name: Hawkeye
description: Clint Barton is the master archer known as Hawkeye.

name: Doctor Strange
description: Master of the mystic arts, defending Earth from magical threats.

name: Black Panther
description: King Tâ€™Challa of Wakanda, protector of his people and the world.

name: Ant-Man
description: Scott Lang uses the Ant-Man suit to shrink and fight crime.

name: Wasp
description: Hope van Dyne dons the Wasp suit and joins Ant-Man on adventures.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Wanda Maximoff has powerful reality-warping and telekinetic abilities.
